description: Returns information about the specified connector's operations.

parameters.name: connectorOperationArn
parameters.description: ARN of the connector operation to be described.

nested_items.name: connectorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector operation.

nested_items.name: connectorOperationState
nested_items.description: The state of the connector operation.

nested_items.name: connectorOperationType
nested_items.description: The type of connector operation performed.

nested_items.name: operationSteps
nested_items.description: The array of operation steps taken.

nested_items.name: stepType
nested_items.description: The step type of the operation.

nested_items.name: stepState
nested_items.description: The step state of the operation.

nested_items.name: originWorkerSetting
nested_items.description: The origin worker setting.

nested_items.name: autoScaling
nested_items.description: Describes the connector's auto scaling capacity.

nested_items.name: maxWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of workers allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: mcuCount
nested_items.description: The number of microcontroller units (MCUs) allocated to each connector worker. The valid values are 1,2,4,8.

nested_items.name: minWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The minimum number of workers allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: scaleInPolicy
nested_items.description: The sacle-in policy for the connector.

nested_items.name: cpuUtilizationPercentage
nested_items.description: Specifies the CPU utilization percentage threshold at which you want connector scale in to be triggered.

nested_items.name: scaleOutPolicy
nested_items.description: The sacle-out policy for the connector.>

nested_items.name: cpuUtilizationPercentage
nested_items.description: The CPU utilization percentage threshold at which you want connector scale out to be triggered.

nested_items.name: provisionedCapacity
nested_items.description: Describes a connector's provisioned capacity.

nested_items.name: mcuCount
nested_items.description: The number of microcontroller units (MCUs) allocated to each connector worker. The valid values are 1,2,4,8.

nested_items.name: workerCount
nested_items.description: The number of workers that are allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: originConnectorConfiguration
nested_items.description: The origin connector configuration.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: targetWorkerSetting
nested_items.description: The target worker setting.

nested_items.name: autoScaling

nested_items.description: The maximum number of workers allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: minWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The minimum number of workers allocated to the connector.

nested_items.name: scaleInPolicy

nested_items.name: cpuUtilizationPercentage
nested_items.description: Specifies the CPU utilization percentage threshold at which you want connector scale in to be triggered.

nested_items.name: scaleOutPolicy
nested_items.description: The sacle-out policy for the connector.>

nested_items.name: cpuUtilizationPercentage
nested_items.description: The CPU utilization percentage threshold at which you want connector scale out to be triggered.

nested_items.name: provisionedCapacity
nested_items.description: Describes a connector's provisioned capacity.

nested_items.name: mcuCount
nested_items.description: The number of microcontroller units (MCUs) allocated to each connector worker. The valid values are 1,2,4,8.

nested_items.name: errorInfo
nested_items.description: Details about the state of a resource.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: A code that describes the state of a resource.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message that describes the state of a resource.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the operation was created.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time when the operation ended.
